refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: Sort a one-dimensional array by one or more attributes. The sort attributes are specified using a 1-based attribute number. The default is ascending order. Set the option argument to desc to sort in descending order.

informalexample.para: Sort a set of random values from lowest to highest:sort(build(<val:double>[i=0:9,10,0],random()%10),val);[(0),(1),(3),(4),(4),(5),(6),(7),(8),(9)]
